title: Top 10 New Build Developments on Costa Blanca 2026
excerpt: Discover the best new build developments on Costa Blanca in 2026. From luxury golf villas in Finestrat to beachfront apartments in Calpe, explore premium properties across Spain's most sought-after coastal region with detailed investment insights.
author: New Build Homes Costa Blanca

content.quickAnswer: The top new build developments on Costa Blanca in 2026 include Marqués Golf Resort in Finestrat (78 luxury homes), JADE 2 in Calpe (beachfront apartments 200m from Arenal Beach), Sierra Cortina developments offering security and views, Las Colinas Golf & Country Club properties (celebrating 15 years), Aqua Blanca Homes in Alicante with energy-efficient design, Horizon Resort in San Miguel de Salinas with private gardens, Botticelli Residence in Moraira (18 Mediterranean villas), and premium developments across South Costa Blanca including Guardamar and Torrevieja.
content.intro: 2026 marks an exceptional year for new build investment on Costa Blanca, with an unprecedented variety of developments catering to every lifestyle preference. From luxury golf resort communities to beachfront apartment towers, the Costa Blanca real estate market offers compelling opportunities for international buyers seeking modern, high-quality properties with guaranteed completion dates and premium amenities. This comprehensive guide explores the top 10 new build developments currently available, each offering distinct advantages in location, design, and investment potential across the region's most coveted areas.

sections.title: 1. Marqués Golf Resort — Finestrat-Benidorm
sections.content: Marqués Golf Resort represents the pinnacle of luxury residential golf living on Costa Blanca, developed by Grupo Immosol. This exclusive complex features 78 premium homes arranged across five blocks with guaranteed Mediterranean Sea and golf course views thanks to innovative side-window design architecture. Each unit offers 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with expansive day areas, triple-insulated exterior walls for soundproofing and energy efficiency, and large terraces ideal for outdoor living. The resort boasts three swimming pools with integrated jacuzzis, a fully equipped wellness center with gym and spa facilities, paddle tennis courts, and extensive landscaped green spaces. Located near Puig Campana Golf Course and premium Costa Blanca beaches, the development is less than 30 minutes from Alicante International Airport. Prices range from €450,000 to €750,000, with March 2026 completion delivering immediate purchase-to-occupancy advantage for investors seeking golf lifestyle properties.

sections.title: 2. JADE 2 — Calpe
sections.content: JADE 2 stands as Calpe's most iconic beachfront development, positioned just 200 meters from Arenal Beach on the town's main avenue with unobstructed Mediterranean views. This prestigious project comprises two 15-story towers offering modern 2-bedroom (from €387,000) and 3-bedroom apartments (from €449,000), plus two exclusive 4-bedroom penthouses on the 15th floor. All units feature expansive terraces with seascape views, and floors from level 7 upwards enjoy panoramic vistas toward Las Salinas nature reserve. Premium amenities include two lagoon-style swimming pools with beach access, landscaped sunbathing areas with artificial grass, fully-equipped gymnasium, paddle tennis court, secure underground parking, and children's playground. The privileged location on a plot with no buildings in front guarantees permanent view preservation—a rarity on developed Costa Blanca coastlines. International ownership is favored here, with significant UK and Nordic investor interest.

sections.title: 3. Sierra Cortina — Finestrat
sections.content: Sierra Cortina represents Costa Blanca's most sought-after residential enclave for discerning buyers prioritizing privacy, security, and landscape views. This low-density development features contemporary villas and townhouses designed for maximum luxury and exclusivity. Seaview 6 within Sierra Cortina offers 3-4 bedroom villas from 155 square meters and 3-bedroom townhouses from 106 square meters, all featuring private gardens or pools, contemporary architecture, and parking facilities, starting at €495,000. Independent villa developments within Sierra Cortina comprise 30 avant-garde units on plots exceeding 400 square meters with options for pools and landscaping customization. Located 5-10 minutes from pristine beaches and coves, Sierra Cortina residents enjoy proximity to championship golf courses, international schools, medical facilities, and upscale shopping centers while maintaining peaceful, gated-community living. The consistent 15%+ annual property appreciation makes Sierra Cortina an investor favorite for capital growth alongside lifestyle quality.

sections.title: 4. Las Colinas Golf & Country Club — Dehesa de Campoamor, Orihuela Costa
sections.content: Las Colinas Golf & Country Club celebrates its 15th anniversary in 2026 as one of Continental Europe's premier golf and residential resort destinations. This world-class facility features an 18-hole championship course recognized in the Top 100 Golf Courses in Continental Europe (Golf World Magazine 2014) and awarded 'Spain's Best Golf Course' at the World Golf Awards in 2015 and 2016. The 2026 anniversary celebration includes the prestigious 15th Anniversary Golf Tournament (August 1) and the 5th edition of Las Colinas Trophy (December 5-6), attracting international golfing elite. Beyond golf, the resort offers international dining at multiple venues including UNIK café, Enso Sushi Bar, and new Italian restaurant il Palco, plus a comprehensive sports and health club with spa treatments. New residential properties available for 2026 completion offer front-line golf views, elevated resort amenities, and investment appreciation potential in Spain's most established and prestigious golf community.

sections.title: 5. JADE 2 Penthouses & Aqua Blanca Homes — Central Alicante & Playa San Juan
sections.content: Aqua Blanca Homes represents cutting-edge sustainable living in Alicante, featuring 87 modern apartments with 2-3 bedrooms in the PAU 5 district, just a 10-minute walk from San Juan and Muchavista beaches. Certified PASSIVHAUS for exceptional energy efficiency, all apartments feature integrated photovoltaic panels generating 100% renewable electricity from on-site solar pergolas. Properties range from 80-102 square meters, priced between €378,000 and €580,000, with expected 2026 completion. Premium finishes include high-quality kitchens with appliances, fully-equipped bathrooms, and abundant natural lighting. Community amenities feature landscaped green zones, large swimming pool, children's play areas, secure bicycle parking, and multi-purpose social spaces. Located in a consolidated neighborhood near Golf Course, supermarkets, pharmacies, sports clubs and Sergio Malgares park, Aqua Blanca combines beach proximity, sustainability credentials, and investment fundamentals appealing to environmentally-conscious European buyers seeking beachfront living at exceptional value.

sections.title: 6. Horizon Resort — San Miguel de Salinas
sections.content: Horizon Resort exemplifies modern, family-oriented coastal living in San Miguel de Salinas, featuring 108 stylish bungalow-style apartments completing in late September 2026. This contemporary development offers flexible configurations: ground-floor homes with private gardens (ideal for families) and top-floor maisonettes featuring expansive rooftop solariums perfect for entertaining and Mediterranean sunset viewing. Two and 3-bedroom options are priced competitively from €189,900 and €249,900 respectively, making them the most accessible entry point for Costa Blanca investors. Each apartment includes open-plan living, fully-equipped modern kitchens with induction cooking, two bathrooms, built-in wardrobes, and premium finishes throughout. Residents enjoy two communal swimming pools, children's play areas, and vibrant community life. Located within walking distance of San Miguel de Salinas' shopping and dining district, yet just 10-15 minutes from blue-flag beaches at Orihuela Costa and Torrevieja, Horizon Resort delivers unbeatable value for owner-occupiers and rental-yield investors seeking South Costa Blanca properties.

sections.title: 7. Botticelli Residence — Moraira
sections.content: Botticelli Residence establishes new standards for luxury Mediterranean villa living in the exclusive Moraira enclave, featuring 18 contemporary new-build villas in prestigious Ibizan-style architecture just five minutes from pristine beaches. Each villa encompasses approximately 180 square meters across three floors (including basement), situated on plots averaging 400 square meters, allowing for private pool construction, landscaping customization, and unobstructed sightlines. Sophisticated floor plans accommodate up to six bedrooms with six bathrooms, private pools, and Mediterranean gardens designed for indoor-outdoor living. The modern Mediterranean aesthetic combines clean lines, generous glazing, and natural materials reflecting Moraira's sophisticated character. Pricing positions Botticelli as Moraira's accessible luxury offering, though seaview villas in prime locations exceed €700,000, with exclusive waterfront properties reaching multimillion-euro valuations. Moraira attracts affluent international ownership (particularly from Nordic and Central European markets), creating strong rental demand and consistent property appreciation in one of Costa Blanca's most desirable residential communities.

sections.title: 8. Mirador de Guardamar — Guardamar del Segura
sections.content: Mirador de Guardamar represents beachfront living excellence in the charming coastal town of Guardamar del Segura, located on Callesa with the Mediterranean beach just 700 meters away. This exquisite new construction development features spacious semi-detached villas with 3 bedrooms, modern finishes, and starting prices from €434,000—exceptional value for South Costa Blanca beach proximity. The low-density residential design maintains neighborhood character while offering secure gated community living with contemporary amenities. Guardamar del Segura offers authentic Spanish coastal charm with less commercial development than neighboring Torrevieja and Orihuela Costa, appealing to buyers prioritizing tranquility alongside beach accessibility. The 19-home residential complex features abundant green spaces, professional landscaping, and community facilities supporting family-oriented living. Recent property market data indicates 15% annual price appreciation in Guardamar, with particular investor interest in new-build offerings combining beach proximity with character village living—positioning Mirador de Guardamar as an intelligent value investment for 2026.

sections.title: 9. Seaview 6 Residences — Sierra Cortina, Finestrat
sections.content: Seaview 6 Residences showcases premium contemporary villa and townhouse living within the exclusive Sierra Cortina development, featuring 3-4 bedroom villas from 155 square meters and 3-bedroom townhouses from 106 square meters. Modern architectural design emphasizes clean aesthetics, abundant natural light, and seamless indoor-outdoor connection through expansive terrace configurations. Villas feature private gardens with optional pool installations, secure parking, and contemporary kitchens with premium appliances. Pricing from €495,000 positions Seaview 6 within accessible luxury parameters while maintaining Sierra Cortina's exclusive community standards. The development benefits from Sierra Cortina's legendary infrastructure: 24-hour security, maintained common areas, diverse architectural styles coexisting harmoniously, and guaranteed property view preservation due to strict density controls. Proximity to international schools, medical facilities, golf clubs, and restaurants within 5-10 minutes of development, combined with permanent beachfront access and comprehensive HOA amenities, creates compelling value proposition for families relocating to Costa Blanca seeking secure, well-appointed residences.

sections.title: 10. Orihuela Costa Masterplan Development — South Costa Blanca Waterfront
sections.content: Orihuela Costa's largest building project in over a decade represents a transformative waterfront development on the final undeveloped coastline section, occupying 456,000 square meters with 1.2 kilometers of beach frontage. Planning permission authorizes 1,500 new homes between Punta Prima and Playa Flamanca, designed accommodating diverse resident demographics including adaptive living communities and senior-living residences within protected flora and fauna reserves. This mega-project will fundamentally reshape Orihuela Costa's residential character, offering contemporary amenities reflecting current lifestyle expectations: modern design, sustainable building practices, secure communities, and integrated commercial/dining/wellness facilities. Current market values in Orihuela Costa exceed €1,800 per square meter (up 15% annually), with expectations for significant appreciation as infrastructure improves and development progresses. For discerning investors, early positioning within the masterplan's initial phases offers exceptional capital appreciation potential and exceptional lifestyle amenities unavailable elsewhere on Costa Blanca. The project's long-term completion horizon (2026-2029+) makes it particularly suitable for investors prioritizing long-term buy-and-hold strategies with rental income optimization during development phases.

content.conclusion:
The 2026 new build landscape across Costa Blanca presents unprecedented opportunity across every investment profile and lifestyle preference. Whether prioritizing golf community living (Marqués Golf Resort, Las Colinas), beachfront luxury (JADE 2, Guardamar), family-friendly amenities (Horizon Resort, Aqua Blanca), or exclusive villa living (Sierra Cortina, Botticelli Residence), savvy investors recognize that new build properties offer multiple advantages: guaranteed quality standards, transparent pricing, generous financing options, modern energy efficiency, extended warranties, and immediate completion advantages. The 15%+ annual property appreciation across Costa Blanca South, combined with strong rental demand (particularly in beachfront locations and golf communities), creates compelling fundamentals for both owner-occupiers and investment-yield seekers. 2026 represents a critical purchasing window—as completion dates arrive and developments transition to resale markets, early-buyer advantages (pre-completion pricing, developer financing, delayed payment schedules, and completion certainty) disappear. This guide's featured developments represent the most compelling opportunities available today, each offering distinct positioning for different investment objectives and lifestyle expectations. Whether your focus centers on capital appreciation, rental income generation, Mediterranean lifestyle relocation, or secure European real estate diversification, Costa Blanca's 2026 new build marketplace delivers unparalleled selection and exceptional value within the context of Spain's most mature, internationally-recognized residential destination.

faqs.question: What are the best new build developments on Costa Blanca for investment in 2026?
faqs.answer: The top developments for 2026 investment include Marqués Golf Resort (luxury golf-view homes), JADE 2 (beachfront apartments), Sierra Cortina villas (exclusive low-density community), Las Colinas Golf Resort properties (prestigious golf amenities), Aqua Blanca Homes (sustainable beach living), and the Orihuela Costa Masterplan (long-term capital appreciation). Each offers distinct investment advantages: golf developments for amenity appeal and rental demand, beachfront for lifestyle premium and vacation rental optimization, and golf-view villas for long-term appreciation and secure community living.

faqs.question: Where should I buy new build on Costa Blanca—north or south?
faqs.answer: North Costa Blanca (Jávea, Calpe, Benidorm, Finestrat, Moraira) attracts premium buyers seeking upscale lifestyle, international communities, and higher-end properties; prices range €3,000-€5,000 per square meter for luxury developments. South Costa Blanca (Torrevieja, Orihuela Costa, Guardamar, San Miguel de Salinas) offers exceptional value with strong rental demand, family-friendly communities, and emerging investment appreciation; prices range €1,400-€2,000 per square meter. For capital appreciation, South Costa Blanca offers superior potential; for lifestyle premiums and amenity access, North Coast developments justify higher price points.

faqs.question: What price range should I expect for new build apartments and villas in 2026?
faqs.answer: New build apartments across Costa Blanca range from €189,900 (Horizon Resort, 2-bedroom entry-level) to €600,000+ (beachfront luxury apartments). Contemporary villas range from €400,000 (Sierra Cortina townhouses) to €2,000,000+ (exclusive seaview villas). Most 2026 completions position 2-bedroom apartments €280,000-€450,000 and 3-bedroom villas €450,000-€1,200,000. Beachfront premiums exceed €500 per square meter above comparable inland locations; golf-proximity premiums range 15-25% above non-golf developments.

faqs.question: What completion dates should I expect for 2026 new build projects?
faqs.answer: Most developments featured in this guide complete between March 2026 (Marqués Golf Resort) and late 2026 (Horizon Resort, Aqua Blanca). Early 2026 completions provide immediate possession advantage and potential short-term rental activation. Late 2026 completions offer extended payment schedules and developer financing flexibility. The Orihuela Costa Masterplan spans 2026-2029+ for full development. Always verify completion dates with developers—delays are common in Spanish construction, though new build contracts include completion guarantees and penalty clauses.

faqs.question: Are new build properties on Costa Blanca good investment for rental income?
faqs.answer: Yes, Costa Blanca new build properties consistently achieve 4-8% annual rental yields, depending on location and season. Beachfront locations (JADE 2, Guardamar, Aqua Blanca) command premium vacation rental rates €1,200-€2,500 monthly July-August, with shoulder-season rates €600-€1,200. Golf communities (Marqués, Las Colinas) attract long-term residents and extended-stay renters. Villa rentals through property management companies average €1,500-€3,500 monthly. 2026 completion dates allow immediate rental activation for owner-investors. Choose developments with strong community amenities, established resort reputations, or beach proximity to optimize rental demand.

faqs.question: What are typical property management and community fees for new build developments?
faqs.answer: Community (HOA) fees across Costa Blanca new builds range €80-€300 monthly depending on amenity comprehensiveness. JADE 2 and beachfront developments charge €150-€250 (pools, landscaping, security, common areas). Golf communities (Marqués, Las Colinas) charge €200-€350 (course maintenance, amenity access, professional management). Sierra Cortina and gated villa communities charge €100-€180 (security, landscaping, maintenance). Budget €120-€200 annually per apartment for property management if renting; villa management typically charges 15-20% of gross rental income. Include community fees and management costs in investment return calculations.

faqs.question: Can non-EU citizens purchase new build property on Costa Blanca in 2026?
faqs.answer: Yes, non-EU citizens can purchase Costa Blanca property without restriction through standard purchase procedures. Most new build developers accommodate international buyers with English-language documentation, extended payment schedules, and non-resident property ownership. You'll require a Spanish tax number (NIE) and may need formal legal representation. Financing from UK/international banks is straightforward for purchases exceeding €250,000. Currency exchange considerations should factor anticipated euro appreciation—many investors utilize fixed-rate hedging strategies. Consult international property tax specialists regarding foreign capital gains taxes, FIRPTA implications (US citizens), or non-resident income reporting requirements applicable to your citizenship.

faqs.question: What makes 2026 an exceptional year for Costa Blanca new build purchasing?
faqs.answer: 2026 convergence of completion dates creates unique purchasing opportunity: (1) Multiple premium developments completing simultaneously increase buyer choice and competitive pricing; (2) Developer incentive financing and extended payment schedules remain available exclusively to pre-completion buyers; (3) Early 2026 completions enable immediate rental activation for investment optimization; (4) Currency valuations (particularly EUR/GBP) favor international buyers from strong-currency jurisdictions; (5) Property price appreciation of 15%+ annually makes 2026 entry point significantly more attractive than waiting for late-2026 resale markets; (6) Developer completion guarantees and new property warranties protect purchaser interests unavailable in secondary resale markets. First-quarter 2026 purchasing captures maximum developer flexibility and financing advantages.
